item.title: The Sustaining of Church Officers
item.description:
The Sustaining of Church Officers by President Gordon B. Hinckley, Second Counselor in the First Presidency given in the Saturday Morning session of the 154th Annual General Conference on Sat Mar 31 1984
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: President Gordon B. Hinckley, Second Counselor in the First Presidency
